titleStmt.title: Vienna, noe art can cure this hart where in is storied, ye valorous atchievements, famous triumphs, constant love, great miseries, & finall happines, of the well-deserving, truly noble and most valiant kt., Sr. Paris of Vienna, and ye most admired amiable Princess, the faire Vienna.
titleStmt.author: M. M. (Matthew Mainwaring), 1561-1652.
Minshull, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Advertisement: p. 181 and p. [1] at end.
Attributed to Matthew Mainwaringe. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
